1.text: Read the conversation and fill in the blanks with always, usually, often, sometimes, rarely and never.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the conversation and fill in the blanks with always, usually, often, sometimes, rarely and never.</prosody></speak>

10.text: We use adverbs of frequency when we say how often something happens. These adverbs are usually placed in front of the main verb in the sentence.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We use adverbs of frequency when we say how often something happens. These adverbs are usually placed in front of the main verb in the sentence.</prosody></speak>

16.text: Adverbs such as once and twice usually go at the end of the sentence.
16.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Adverbs such as once and twice usually go at the end of the sentence.</prosody></speak>
